comments.author: mkanat@bugzilla.org
comments.raw_text:
We need a test for Bugzilla::BugUrl that assures that it behaves properly for all inputs in all situations, particularly now that we have so many subclasses.

This would probably be an xt/ test.
comments.creator: mkanat@bugzilla.org
comments.text:
We need a test for Bugzilla::BugUrl that assures that it behaves properly for all inputs in all situations, particularly now that we have so many subclasses.

This would probably be an xt/ test.
This would IMO make more sense as a Selenium or WebService script.
comments.raw_text: This would IMO make more sense as a Selenium or WebService script.
